Joseph V. Perry https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_V._Perry 0 Joseph V. Perry (February 13, 1931 – February 23, 2000) was an American actor possibly best known for his role as Nemo in Everybody Loves Raymond. Joseph_V._Perry ( February_13_,_1931 – February_23_,_2000 ) was an_American_actor possibly_best_known for his_role as Nemo in Everybody Loves Raymond .
